data.name: Shatterspace
data.detailed_description:
Shatterspace is a satisfyingly-intense action/survival game where tight steering controls are your weapon. Pilot your way through an onslaught of enemy waves, mini-games and challenging boss fights.

Simple to pick up and play, difficult to master.

Designed for controller but enjoyable on keyboard as well.

data.short_description: Super-tight controls and satisfying mechanics will guide you from the seemingly-peaceful early levels all the way to complete insanity in this survival space adventure. Beginner pilots will grow, skilled pilots will be challenged, but only the best will reach the end.
